body:
This is nice Antonello. Thanks.

I have one wish and one think for you to check.

The wish: To connect the data directly without passing through the LB_separateData. Not critical, but you can save one step in the process.

The check: Testing the "second mode" in your file i noticed that changing the analysis period changes the results. Sometimes the changes are to big to bare. Try month 1 to 4 and then 1 to 8, etc.



Thanks and keep going,

-A.
